name: Will It Ever End?
summary:
Will it ever end - Is a short but deep story about love and routine.
Work, home, repeat. This cycle is familiar to almost every modern person.
Routine makes our life joyless and the days blend together.
Is there a way out? What can one do do about it?
The story begins in a man's room. You'll have to live a few days of his life to get some answers.
There are no words here. You'll understand it through pictures, music and interaction.
